core.models module¶

class core.models.Article(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

News article created by a journalist. May be published independently or under a publisher. Requires approval of an editor.

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

approved¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

author¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

class core.models.Publisher(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Represents a news publishing entity that can have multiple editors, journalists, and subscribers.

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

articles¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class core.models.User(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: AbstractUser

Custom user model extended from Django’s AbstractUser. Assigns a role and links to relevant groups.

save(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Override save to assign users to their role-based group automatically. Also ensures irrelevant subscription fields are cleared.

core.views module¶

core.views.api_guide(request)[source]¶

Static page that explains how to use the REST API.

core.views.approve_article(request, pk)[source]¶

Approve an article and notify subscribers.

core.views.article_detail(request, id)[source]¶

Displays the full article.

core.views.create_article(request)[source]¶

Handles creation of a new article by a journalist.

core.views.create_newsletter(request)[source]¶

Creates a new newsletter.

core.views.dashboard(request)[source]¶

Redirects user to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.

core.views.delete_article(request, pk)[source]¶

Deletes an article if it’s an independent one by the author.

core.views.delete_newsletter(request, pk)[source]¶

Deletes an existing newsletter.

core.views.edit_journalist_profile(request)[source]¶

Allows a journalist to edit their profile.

core.views.home(request)[source]¶

The public Home Page.

core.views.is_editor(user)[source]¶

Checks if the user is an editor.

core.views.is_journalist(user)[source]¶

Checks if the user is a journalist.

core.views.is_publisher(user)[source]¶

Checks if the user is a publisher.

core.views.is_reader(user)[source]¶

Checks if the user is a reader.

core.views.journalist_dashboard(request)[source]¶

Shows the journalist’s dashboard with independent articles and newsletters. Only shows content not linked to any publisher.

core.views.journalist_detail(request, pk)[source]¶

Displays a journalist’s profile.

core.views.journalist_list(request)[source]¶

List of all journalists.

core.views.newsletter_detail(request, pk)[source]¶

Displays the full newsletter.

core.views.publisher_dashboard(request)[source]¶

Shows the publisher’s dashboard. If a publisher profile doesn’t exist for this user, create one.

core.views.publisher_detail(request, publisher_id)[source]¶

Shows detail page for a publisher including their approved articles.

core.views.publisher_list(request)[source]¶

Public list of all publishers.

core.views.reader_dashboard(request)[source]¶

Reader dashboard shows articles and newsletters from subscriptions.

core.views.register(request)[source]¶

Generic registration for any user (not used for role-specific signups).

core.views.register_journalist(request)[source]¶

Registers a user as a journalist.

core.views.register_publisher(request)[source]¶

Registers a user as a publisher.

core.views.register_subscriber(request)[source]¶

Registers a user as a reader/subscriber.

core.views.subscribe_publisher(request, publisher_id)[source]¶

Subscribe to a publisher.

core.views.subscribe_to_journalist(request, journalist_id)[source]¶

Subscribe to a journalist.

core.views.unsubscribe_from_journalist(request, journalist_id)[source]¶

Unsubscribe from a journalist.

core.views.update_article(request, pk)[source]¶

Updates an article if it’s an independent one by the author.

core.views.update_newsletter(request, pk)[source]¶

Updates an existing newsletter.

core.views.update_publisher_profile(request)[source]¶

Allows a publisher to update their profile.

core.views.user_login(request)[source]¶

Handles user login.

core.views.user_logout(request)[source]¶

Logs out the user.
